name: Paballo
description: She's such a bubbly, kind, and intelligent young lady, always laughing and full of life. I adore everything about her.

name: Gomolemo
description: A quiet gentleman who doesn't talk much and can come across as shy, but once you get to know him, he's an absolute sweetheart.

name: Thabane
description: Another quiet soul, but he's slowly opening up and getting comfortable in his surroundings. Very nice guy.

name: Njabulo
description: My son, calm and incredibly smart. dresses very wellI wouldn't call him shy he just takes his time to assess his environment before getting comfortable.

name: Phemelo
description: Mr charmer himself he's such an amazing soul, smart always smiling, and naturally gets along with everyone.

name: Tshenolo
description: She's truly special- a calm and kind soul who doesn't say much but is incredibly smart as well. we share a connection that no one else could ever understand. I love her to bits.

name: Andile
description: Very calm and quite but loves to laugh. He doesn't say much, except during our one on one's, where his true gentlemen nature shines through .

name: Adrian
description: He may seem shy around people he doesn't know but quickly warms up when he feels welcomed, loving soul as well.

name: Remoneilwe
description: A whirlwind of energy. She's always where the action is, I love her crazy, amazing soul to pieces.

name: Slindokuhle
description: He's like the male version of Remocrazy but so sweet. I admire his hard-working nature and determination to achieve his goals. He's a true family man who deeply loves his daughter.
